greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Numerators of reduced forms of fractions obtained by performing the first n divisions shown below.
comment: In other words, the successive fractions are
Suggested by a question from Ciprian Bonciocat (6 years old).
formula: a(n) = numerator of x(n) where x(0)=1, x(2n+1) = x(2n) (4n+1)/(4n+2), x(2n+2) = x(2n+1)(4n+4)/(4n+3). - _Matthew Conroy_ Jun 26 2006
results.author: Mihai Cipu (mihai.cipu(AT)imar.ro), Jun 05 2006
